page.title: 14LHANBRYDE ARCHERY CLUB
page.content:
There are two types of bow, standard and composite which is the more powerful.The standard bow is used by beginners and youngest members, the composite being used by the more experienced archers.
All members have the chance to take part in regular competitions.National and international teams have visited Lhanbryde, making it one of the better-known venues in the north of Scotland.Our members have gained much experience at a high level of competition,and this opportunity to gain such awards makes sure that {Lhanbryde Archery Club}is one of the most successful family village activities.
